Fullname_jp: 三世妖狐 タマモノマエ

transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
At the start of the turn, inflicts Cursed on two random enemies for 1 turn (Irremovable)
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge reduction
transcend.4_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +16%
ターン開始時、ランダムの敵2体に呪いを+1ターン(解除不可)
チェーンパッシブのWGダメージ+1
transcend.4_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +16%
턴 시작 시 무작위 적 2명에게 저주 +1턴 (해제 불가)
체인 패시브의 WG 감소량 +1
transcend.4_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +16%
回合开始时,
随机诅咒2名敌人+1回合(无法解除)
连携被动效果的WG降低量+1
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
Burst Level 3 Unlocked
+25 Action Points at battle start
transcend.5_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +22%
バーストスキル3段階解禁
戦闘開始時、AP+25
transcend.5_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +22%
버스트 3단계 해금
입장 시 AP +25
transcend.5_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +22%
解锁3阶爆发
入场时AP+25
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+100% Effectiveness
Right after attacking, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response
transcend.6_jp:
ATK DEF HP +30%
効果命中+100%
攻撃後、敵の反撃/復讐/迅速対応発動不可
transcend.6_kr:
ATK DEF HP +30%
효과 적중 +100%
공격 직후 적의 반격/복수/신속 대응 불가
transcend.6_zh:
ATK DEF HP +30%
效果命中+100%
攻击后敌人无法
反击/复仇/迅速应对

SKT_FIRST.name: Kitsunebi
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy with Heavy Strike.
Has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict Cursed on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. (Irremovable)
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp:
敵単体に強撃でダメージを与える。
対象に<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で呪いを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。(解除不可)
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr:
적을 강격으로 공격합니다. 
대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 저주를 부여합니다. (해제 불가)
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh:
强击敌人。
并有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率对目标造成诅咒效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1</color>回合。(无法解除)

SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 呪い1個追加(解除不可)\n効果発動確率+20%
SKT_BURST_1.effect_kr: 저주 1개 추가 발생 (해제 불가)\n효과 발동 확률 +20%
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 额外触发1次诅咒(无法解除)\n效果触发几率+20%

SKT_BURST_2.effect_zh: 额外触发1次诅咒(无法解除)

SKT_BURST_3.effect:
Changes to Enhanced Skill
Targets all enemies
Resets all skill cooldowns of the caster
Extra Turn
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp:
強化スキルに変更
攻撃範囲拡大
自分のすべてのスキルターン初期化
追加ターン
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr:
강화 스킬로 교체
공격 범위 확대
자신의 모든 스킬 쿨타임 초기화
추가 턴
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh:
转化为强化技能
扩大攻击范围
自身的所有技能冷却时间重置
额外回合

SKT_SECOND.name: Bite ‘Em, Kitsu!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
Attacks all enemies with Heavy Strike.
For each target damaged, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>25%</color>, and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict Cursed on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. (Irremovable)
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
敵全体に強撃でダメージを与える。
ダメージを与えた対象の数に応じて自分の行動ゲージが<color=#28d9ed>25%</color>UPし、対象全体に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で、呪いを<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。(解除不可)
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
적 전체를 강격으로 공격합니다. 
피해를 준 대상마다 자신의 행동 게이지가 <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> 증가하고, 대상 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 저주를 부여합니다. (해제 불가)
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh:
强击全体敌人。
每对1个目标造成伤害,自身的行动值提升<color=#28d9ed>25%</color>,并有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的几率对全体目标造成诅咒效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。(无法解除)

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: All Ties Are But Dreams
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: 一切有為法 如夢幻泡影
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_zh: 一切有为法,如梦幻泡影
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc:
Attacks all enemies with Heavy Strike and recovers Chain Points by <color=#28d9ed>15</color>.
After attacking, detonates all Cursed stacks on the target and reduces Action Points by <color=#28d9ed>80</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp:
敵全体に強撃でダメージを与え、CPを<color=#28d9ed>15</color>獲得する。
攻撃後、対象の呪いをすべて破裂させ、APを<color=#28d9ed>80</color>DOWNさせる。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr:
적 전체를 강격으로 공격하고 CP를 <color=#28d9ed>15</color> 회복합니다.
공격 후 대상의 저주를 모두 폭발시키고, AP를 <color=#28d9ed>80</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh:
强击全体敌人,恢复<color=#28d9ed>15</color>的CP。
攻击后,使目标受到的所有诅咒效果爆炸,AP减少<color=#28d9ed>80</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color>. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で対象に解除不可能な<color=#28d9ed>呪い</color>を<color=#28d9ed>3ターン</color>の間付与する。このスキルは<color=#28d9ed>強撃</color>の攻撃判定になる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で解除不可能な<color=#28d9ed>呪い</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。このスキルは<color=#28d9ed>強撃</color>の攻撃判定になる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>3턴</color> 동안 대상에게 해제 불가능한 <color=#28d9ed>저주</color>를 부여합니다. 해당 공격은 <color=#28d9ed>강격</color>으로 적용됩니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 해제 불가능한 <color=#28d9ed>저주</color>를 부여합니다. 해당 공격은 <color=#28d9ed>강격</color>으로 적용됩니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携起始效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率对目标造成无法解除的<color=#28d9ed>诅咒</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>3回合</color>。该攻击造成<color=#28d9ed>强击</color>效果。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率造成无法解除的<color=#28d9ed>诅咒</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。该攻击造成<color=#28d9ed>强击</color>效果。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
